resp = client.indices.create(
    index="events",
    settings={
        "index": {
            "sort.field": "timestamp",
            "sort.order": "desc"
        }
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "timestamp": {
                "type": "date"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
